item.title: Russia Knocks Out the Heat in Ukraine
item.description: The Kremlin has tried for years to freeze Ukraine into submission. This winter, its attacks have been the most devastating ever.

item.title: The Gaudy, Nasty Fictions of Donald J. Trump
item.description: This is neither law nor order, and the consequences can be deadly.

item.title: Cyberattack in Venezuela Demonstrated Precision of U.S. Capabilities
item.description: Senators are expected to ask Lt. Gen. Joshua M. Rudd, President Trump’s nominee to lead the U.S. Cyber Command, about the mission in Caracas.

item.title: Nobel Committee Takes Heat at Home as Machado Courts Trump in D.C.

item.title: The U.S. Is Pressing Mexico to Allow U.S. Forces to Fight Cartels
item.description: The United States is escalating pressure on the Mexican government to permit the U.S. military to target fentanyl labs, according to American official...
